string.value: #p1013101# seems to have an Incubator that can be used to hatch an egg. Talk to #b#p1013101##k.

#p1013101# says that he will give you an Incubator if you do his chore of collecting #t4032451#s. Go to your #bright#k and collect the #t4032451# that #p1013101# is supposed to collect. You can obtain an #b#t4032451##k by clicking on a #b#p1013104##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032451# #t4032451# #b#c4032451# / 1#k
You collected the #t4032451# and received an incubator from #p1013101#.
An Incubator? Yeah, I have one. I picked it up after an adventurer tossed it a while ago. It should still work. Why? You need it?

Okay, you can have the Incubator, but you have to do me a favor first. Mom wants me to collect some #t4032451#s, but it's such a bother. If you collect an #t4032451# for me, I'll give you the Incubator. Do we have a deal?
Okay, then go to that #b#p1013104# to your right#k and bring back an #t4032451#. You can get an #t4032451# by clicking on the #p1013104#. You just need to get me #bone#k.
Fine. I'll just keep the Incubator, then.
What, you still haven't brought back #b1 #t4032451##k? The #p1013104# is just to your #bright#k. What? Am I scared of chickens? You know that's not true! I just don't want to do it, that's all!
